import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import './pay.css' import axios from 'axios'; function Payment() { const[setpayment] =useState([]); const [form ,setForm]=useState({}); const onChangeHandler= (e) => { setForm({ ...form, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }); }; const onSbmitHandler= (e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); axios.post('api/payment', form) .then(res=>{ setMessage(res.data.message) setShow(true) setTimeout(() => { setShow(false) }, 4000); }) .catch(err=>setErrors(err.response.data)) } useEffect(()=>{ axios.get('api/payment') .then(res=>{ setrooms(res.data) }); },[]) return (

Payment Methods

Summary

Booking:: Name of product

Price::LKR:10000

Credit Card

Payment Detials



Booking:: Name of product

Price: :LKR25000

Sumbit
) } export default Payment
